page.title: 18Ian,s day (aged 7)
page.content: I woke up at half past six.I had Weetabix for breakfast then I put on a tee_shirt,long trousers and bumper shoes and walked to school.I did some reading,singing and my workbook and then I drew some birds for our bird project.After play we went out to look for plants.I counted 25 different plants in our school garden. I had Cornish Pasty and potatoes for school dinner.In the afternoon I made a clay bird and did some sewing.Then we had P.E.outside and finished with a story.We went home at 3.15p.m. After school I played with Carl at the farm. For tea I had tomato soup. Then I played with Carl again and went on the Moorend with Mary and James. I had a bath and went to bed at half past eight. My Mum read a story and I went to sleep at half past nine.
